statements: SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, email FROM students WHERE registration_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT last_name, first_name FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM students;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_credit_hours FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT student_name FROM students WHERE student_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM courses ORDER BY course_credit_hours DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_credit_hours FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT course_name, course_credit_hours FROM courses WHERE course_credit_hours >= 3;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT course_name, course_description, course_credit_hours FROM Courses WHERE course_credit_hours >= 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, registration_date FROM Students JOIN Registrations ON Students.student_id = Registrations.student_id JOIN Courses ON Registrations.course_id = Courses.course_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Registrations ON Students.student_id = Registrations.student_id JOIN Courses ON Registrations.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Courses.course_credit_hours < 4;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT course_name, course_credit_hours FROM Courses WHERE course_credit_hours >= 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students INNER JOIN Registrations ON Students.student_id = Registrations.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Courses.course_id = Registrations.course_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name, registration_date FROM Students JOIN Registrations ON Students.student_id = Registrations.student_id JOIN Courses ON Courses.course_id = Registrations.course_id WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses;
SELECT registration_id, student_id, course_id, registration_date FROM registrations;
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade FROM students JOIN registrations ON students.student_id = registrations.student_id JOIN grades ON registrations.registration_id = grades.registration_id;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Programming%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, c.course_name, r.registration_date FROM students s JOIN registrations r ON s.student_id = r.student_id JOIN courses c ON c.course_id = r.course_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM students;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id, registration_date FROM registrations ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM instructors WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE age > 25;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM registrations JOIN students ON registrations.student_id = students.student_id;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(course_id) AS courses_registered FROM registrations GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY courses_registered DESC;
